eu_initiatives: Medical Device Regulation and associated Guidance Documents, JRC Activities, IMDRF, Research activities of any kind related to Registries/Real World Evidence/Market Surveillance on Medical Devices
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Working Group on Clinical Investigation and Evaluation #E01576#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1576#Member#C
relevant_communication:
EUPHORIC Project (1st Health Programme) 
PARENT JA 
Meetings and Dissemination at Research Congresses 
Dissemination of know how to develop Projects on national and regional Level (memberstates and outside EU) 
Provide Access to know how by an expert Network concerning quality monitoring and outcome assessment concerning high risk medical devices to EU Commision, member states and cooperation activities.
goals__remit:
EARN is a voluntary network of experts in the field of outcome research, particularly registries and other real world big data. 
EARN members consent to support regulatory purposes and public health goals in a transparent way. 
EARN members support to develop and implement best practice in quality monitoing of medical devices (particularly in orthopaedics and arthroplasty) in the entire EU and beyond.
